abstract: The trio of executives are building a computer system that aims to supply publishers with ready-made tools to charge Internet fees.
snippet: The trio of executives are building a computer system that aims to supply publishers with ready-made tools to charge Internet fees.
lead_paragraph: Three longtime media executives are building an automated system to allow newspapers and magazines to charge for online access, including an “all you can read” subscription that would allow access to multiple publications, the executives said on Tuesday.

headline.main: Media Executives Plan Online Service to Charge for Content
headline.print_headline: Plans for a Paid Online Media Service
